entries.description: Add support for Kubernetes v1.26.13, v1.27.10 and v1.28.6.
Set default Kubernetes version to v1.27.10.
Fix a bug where Operating System Profiles were not being listed for GCP/GCE.
Stop constantly re-deploying operating-system-manager when registry mirrors are configured.
Remove 1.25 from list of supported versions on AKS.
